metadata.name: x402_escrow
metadata.description: x402Resolve Escrow Program - Automated dispute resolution for agent payments

docs: x402Resolve Escrow Program
Holds payments in escrow with time-lock and dispute resolution.
Enables automated refunds based on verifier oracle signatures.

instructions.name: add_oracle
docs: Add an oracle to the registry

instructions.name: check_rate_limit
docs: Rate limit check - ensures entity hasn't exceeded limits

instructions.name: init_reputation
docs: Initialize or update entity reputation

instructions.name: initialize_escrow
docs: Initialize a new escrow for agent-to-API payment
# Arguments
* `amount` - Amount to escrow (lamports or token amount)
* `time_lock` - Duration before auto-release (seconds)
* `transaction_id` - Unique transaction identifier
* `use_spl_token` - Whether to use SPL token (true) or SOL (false)

instructions.name: initialize_oracle_registry
docs: Initialize the oracle registry

instructions.name: initialize_oracle_votes
docs: Initialize oracle votes storage for sequential submission

instructions.name: mark_disputed
docs: Mark escrow as disputed (agent initiates dispute)

instructions.name: release_funds
docs: Release funds to API (happy path - no dispute)
Can be called by:
- Agent (explicitly releasing)
- Anyone after time_lock expires (auto-release)

instructions.name: remove_oracle
docs: Remove an oracle from the registry

instructions.name: resolve_dispute
docs: Resolve dispute with verifier oracle signature
x402 Verifier Oracle assesses quality and signs a refund percentage.
This instruction validates the signature and splits funds accordingly.
# Arguments
* `quality_score` - Quality score from verifier (0-100)
* `refund_percentage` - Refund percentage (0-100)
* `signature` - Ed25519 signature from verifier oracle

instructions.name: resolve_dispute_multi_oracle
docs: Resolve dispute with multi-oracle consensus

instructions.name: resolve_dispute_sequential
docs: Resolve dispute with sequential oracle votes (reads from OracleVotes account)
This instruction consumes the votes submitted via submit_oracle_vote

accounts.name: payer
docs: Payer to receive rent refund when closing oracle_votes account

instructions.name: resolve_dispute_switchboard
docs: Resolve dispute with Switchboard On-Demand oracle
Uses Switchboard decentralized oracle network for trustless quality assessment.
The Switchboard Function calculates quality score off-chain and produces
a cryptographically verified attestation that's validated on-chain.
# Arguments
* `quality_score` - Quality score from Switchboard Function (0-100)
* `refund_percentage` - Refund percentage from Switchboard (0-100)

accounts.name: switchboard_function
docs: Switchboard Function pull feed containing quality score

instructions.name: submit_oracle_vote
docs: Submit a single oracle vote (for sequential submission)
This allows splitting multi-oracle consensus into multiple small transactions

instructions.name: update_reputation
docs: Update reputation after transaction completes
Only callable by the escrow program itself during resolve_dispute

accounts.name: authority
docs: Authority that can update reputation (restricted)

errors.name: InvalidStatus
errors.msg: Invalid escrow status for this operation

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized: Only agent or expired escrow can release

errors.name: InvalidQualityScore
errors.msg: Invalid quality score (must be 0-100)

errors.name: InvalidRefundPercentage
errors.msg: Invalid refund percentage (must be 0-100)

errors.name: InvalidSignature
errors.msg: Invalid verifier signature

errors.name: InvalidTimeLock
errors.msg: Invalid time lock: must be between 1 hour and 30 days

errors.name: InvalidAmount
errors.msg: Invalid amount: must be greater than 0

errors.name: InvalidTransactionId
errors.msg: Invalid transaction ID: must be non-empty and max 64 chars

errors.name: TimeLockNotExpired
errors.msg: Time lock not expired: cannot release funds yet

errors.name: DisputeWindowExpired
errors.msg: Dispute window expired: cannot dispute after time lock

errors.name: AmountTooLarge
errors.msg: Amount too large: exceeds maximum escrow amount

errors.name: InsufficientDisputeFunds
errors.msg: Insufficient funds to pay dispute cost

errors.name: RateLimitExceeded
errors.msg: Rate limit exceeded: too many transactions

errors.name: ProviderSuspended
errors.msg: Provider is suspended

errors.name: ReputationTooLow
errors.msg: Reputation score too low for this operation

errors.name: ArithmeticOverflow
errors.msg: Arithmetic overflow in calculation

errors.name: InsufficientRentReserve
errors.msg: Insufficient rent reserve in escrow account

errors.name: InvalidSwitchboardAttestation
errors.msg: Invalid Switchboard attestation

errors.name: StaleAttestation
errors.msg: Switchboard attestation is stale (older than 60 seconds)

errors.name: QualityScoreMismatch
errors.msg: Quality score mismatch between Switchboard and submitted value

errors.name: InsufficientOracleConsensus
errors.msg: Insufficient oracle consensus - need at least min_consensus oracles

errors.name: UnregisteredOracle
errors.msg: Oracle not registered in registry

errors.name: NoConsensusReached
errors.msg: Oracle scores too divergent - no consensus reached

errors.name: DuplicateOracleSubmission
errors.msg: Oracle already submitted for this dispute

errors.name: MaxOraclesReached
errors.msg: Maximum oracles reached in registry

errors.name: OracleNotFound
errors.msg: Oracle not found in registry

errors.name: InvalidOracleWeight
errors.msg: Invalid oracle weight - must be > 0

errors.name: MissingTokenMint
errors.msg: Token mint account is required for SPL token escrows

errors.name: MissingTokenAccount
errors.msg: Token account is required for SPL token escrows

errors.name: MissingTokenProgram
errors.msg: Token program is required for SPL token escrows

errors.name: TokenDecimalsMismatch
errors.msg: Token decimals mismatch

errors.name: InvalidTokenAccountOwner
errors.msg: Invalid token account owner

errors.name: TokenMintMismatch
errors.msg: Token mint mismatch between accounts

errors.name: UnsupportedOracleType
errors.msg: Oracle type not supported in multi-oracle consensus (currently only Ed25519)

types.name: EntityReputation
docs: Entity Reputation - tracks agent/provider performance on-chain

types.name: OracleConfig
docs: Configuration for a single oracle

types.name: OracleRegistry
docs: Oracle Registry - Stores approved oracle list and consensus config

types.name: OracleSubmission
docs: Individual oracle submission for quality assessment

types.name: OracleSubmissionInput
docs: Input structure for oracle submissions in instructions

types.name: OracleType
docs: Type of oracle for verification

types.name: OracleVote
docs: Individual oracle vote with signature

types.name: OracleVotes
docs: Temporary storage for oracle votes (for sequential submission)
This account holds oracle submissions until final consensus is calculated

types.name: RateLimiter
docs: Rate Limiter - prevents spam and abuse
